snippet: The decision to allow adolescents to buy the pill without a prescription has done nothing to improve the stock value of Teva Pharmaceuticals, the company that makes Plan B One-Step.
abstract: Obama administration decision to allow adolescents to buy emergency birth-control pill without a prescription has done nothing to improve the stock value of Teva Pharmaceuticals, company that makes Plan B One-Step; it had relatively small $93 million in sales from drug over past year.
lead_paragraph: The decision to allow adolescents to buy the pill without a prescription has done nothing to improve the stock value of Teva Pharmaceuticals, the company that makes Plan B One-Step.

headline.main: Lifting Restrictions of ‘Morning After’ Pill Has Little Impact for Drug Maker
headline.print_headline: Lifting Restrictions of ‘Morning After’ Pill Has Little Impact for Drug Maker
